thread.title: Beyonce's Baby Bump Is Performing at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Beyonce's Baby Bump Is Performing at the Grammys

title: Beyonce's Baby Bump Is Performing at the Grammys
text:
Beyonce's Baby Bump Is Performing at the Grammys 
Thanks be to Bey. By Sally Holmes Feb 2, 2017 Beynificent news on this wonderful Beyday: Beyoncé will be performing at the Grammy Awards on February 12, ET reports . While this news alone would have made us giddy just two days ago, ONE day ago Bey announced that she is expecting not one, but TWO Beybays, which means she'll get to see her perform in all her pregnant glory in two weeks. Of course, this isn't the first time Queen B has taken the stage while expecting: She announced her pregnancy five years ago on the VMAS stage. You may remember, it was kind of a big deal: Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Most Popular Here's hoping she reenacts some of those photos from her pregnancy shoot because I want to see this in real time: Beyoncé
